dict.acceptation: 没有东西；没有事情；无关紧要的东西；毫无趣味的事；

sent.orig: NOTHING is established in 2009, base on military and street be our style.
sent.trans: NOTHING成立于二零零九年，以军事、街头为基调。

sent.orig: Love was nothing, faith nothing-nothing, nothing!
sent.trans: 爱情是空，信仰是空--空呀，空呀！

sent.orig: The person who risks nothing does nothing, has nothing and is nothing.
sent.trans: 一个不敢冒险的人，一事无成，一无所有，也一无是处。

sent.orig: We float in between different opinions: we want nothing freely, nothing absolutely, nothing constantly.
sent.trans: 我们摆荡在不同的意见之间：我们不要自由、不要绝对、也不要不变的东西。

sent.orig: Joker: You have nothing, nothing to threaten me with. Nothing to do with all your strength.
sent.trans: 小丑：你不能拿任何、任何的东西威胁我，凭你的全部力量根本做不到任何事情！
